file title  : FAO Soil Types of Matthews & Fung Wetland Locations
data type   : integer
file type   : binary

rows        : 180
ref. system : lat/long
ref. units  : deg
unit dist.  : 1.0000000
min. X      : -180.0000000

value units : characteristic classes
value error : unknown
flag value  : -1
flag def'n  : flag value signifies water
